[`struct SIMD16Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd16storage)Storage for a vector of 16 floating-point values.[`struct SIMD2Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd2storage)Storage for a vector of two floating-point values.[`struct SIMD32Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd32storage)Storage for a vector of 32 floating-point values.[`struct SIMD4Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd4storage)Storage for a vector of four floating-point values.[`struct SIMD64Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd64storage)Storage for a vector of 64 floating-point values.[`struct SIMD8Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd8storage)Storage for a vector of eight floating-point values.### [Type Aliases](/documentation/Swift/Float/SIMDScalar-Implementations#Type-Aliases)
